name: Locked N Loaded
description:
You are transporting a prisoner to jail, but you lost an arm in an explosion a few years back.

This means you have to choose to either hold the chain or hold your gun, letting the prisoner go.

WASD to move
Mouse to aim, LMB to shoot
Space to release prisoner, grab him again, or chain him to a pole (when close enough)
F11 to go in and out of fullscreen
Escape to return to main menu
